rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses factual language without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The verb 'reports' is not a moderate verb.
No loaded rhetorical question is present in the text.
The segment reports facts/statistic but does not contain explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Reports factual data (reports of mammalian infections) which is part of surveillance capability.
